byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN and PATRICIA COHEN

abstract: Donald J. Trump laid out a plan to revamp the tax code, seeking reductions for people at most income levels, including for the highest earners.

headline.main: Donald Trump Unveils Plan to Overhaul Tax Code With Broad Cuts
headline.print_headline: Trump’s Plan Is a Big Tax Cut for the Middle Class and the Wealthiest
